verbose_text: XREF_BIBR GRHL2 (MIM 608576) has been shown to regulate TERT (MIM 187270) expression and to enhance proliferation of epidermal keratinocytes; it also impairs keratinocyte differentiation through transcription inhibition of genes clustered at the epidermal differentiation complex XREF_BIBR and regulates epithelial morphogenesis by establishing functional tight junctions.
